query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
1 Quel sol che pria d’amor mi scaldò ’l petto, 2 di bella verità m’avea scoverto, 3 provando e riprovando, il dolce aspetto;
query.error: **English:** 1 That sun which previously warmed my breast with love, 2 had revealed to me beautiful truth, 3 proving and re-proving its sweet aspect;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
4 e io, per confessar corretto e certo 5 me stesso, tanto quanto si convenne 6 leva’ il capo a proferer più erto;
query.error: **English:** 4 and I, in order to confess myself corrected and certain, 5 as much as was fitting, 6 raised my head to speak more loftily;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
7 ma visïone apparve che ritenne 8 a sé me tanto stretto, per vedersi, 9 che di mia confession non mi sovvenne.
query.error: **English:** 7 but a vision appeared that held me 8 so tightly to itself, in order to be seen, 9 that I did not remember my confession.
query.result: 7 mes visyon a dheuth dhe weles 8 ow dhe’m owth owthstrik, rag owth owthweles, 9 byttegens na ow kovsas ow gonfesi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.error: **English:** 10 As through transparent and clear glass, 11 or through clear and tranquil waters, 12 not so deep that the bottoms are lost,
query.result: 10 Kevel a-dreus gwydrow treus ha kler, 11 po dhe’m a-dreus dowrow kler ha siwel, 12 nyns dhe’n dowr byttegens na’n fondyow a wra kollys,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
13 tornan d’i nostri visi le postille 14 debili sì, che perla in bianca fronte 15 non vien men forte a le nostre pupille;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.error: **English:** 16 such I saw more faces ready to speak; 17 because of which I ran into the opposite error 18 to that which kindled love between man and the spring.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 22 ha nyns owthwelas nevra, ha owth owthtroas aga 23 owth owthsyth yn golow an arweydh dheles, 24 pyw, owth owthsmilia, a wra owth owthloski yn aga lagadow sans.

Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
